Service Details: - Provides access to non-emergency health information and advice in British Columbia via telephone, a website, a mobile app, or print resources- Call free-of-charge to speak with a health services navigator any time of the day or night who can help you find health information and services, or connect you directly with a registered nurse- Call Mon-Fri, 9:00am - 5:00pm to speak with a registered dietitian, or a qualified exercise professional- Call each evening from 5:00pm - 9:00pm to speak with a pharmacist- Translation services are available in over 130 languages
Languages: English ; - Translation services are available over the phone in more than 130 languages on request- The BC HealthGuide Handbook is currently available in French and Punjabi- HealthLinkBC files are available in English, Chinese,  Farsi, French, Korean, Punjabi, Spanish, and Vietnamese
